DOC.brief_summary: The Scanning Kelvin Probe measure surface electrical potential without actually touch skin . This pilot study evaluate method minimize noise Scanning Kelvin Probe measurement . This project focus specifically noise arise physical movement environmental electrical field .
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Skin Electrical Potential With Kelvin Probe : Minimizing Noise
